column4: Hello I have a Amilo laptop and have just freshly install ubuntu 10.4 however I can't enable wireless on it.  Does anyone have any suggestings on how I could fix this?
do you know what wirless card is in it ?
I'm not sure what the NIC is but the problem is the laptop needs you to press "fn key + F1" to enable wireless and its not working.
work through that link, that's a good start
